015

首先輸入大數運算的模式，
以1代表大數相加；2代表大數相減；3代表大數相乘。
再輸入兩行20~40位數(包含上下限)的正整數做運算，
並輸出計算過後的結果。
=================
sample input 1：
1
10000000000000000000
10000000000000000000


1100000000000000002
2000000000000000003
sample output 1：
20000000000000000000
=================
sample input 2：
1
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999
10000000000000000000

sample output 2：
10000000000000000000009999999999999999999
=================
sample input 3：
1
10000000000000000000
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999

sample output 3：
10000000000000000000009999999999999999999
=================
sample input 4：
1
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999

sample output 4：
19999999999999999999999999999999999999998
=================
sample input 5：
1
9578977894569458768957689498576
3879820923099819028419182498493572571412

sample output 5：
3879820932678796922988641267451262069988
=================
sample input 6：
1
12903129413974305729385092389023492
17984731893298742340

sample output 6：
12903129413974323714116985687765832
=================
sample input 7：
1
9749823749999999999991284901093564590
9749823749999999999991284901093564590

sample output 7：
19499647499999999999982569802187129180
=================
sample input 8：
2
10000000000000000000
10000000000000000000

sample output 8：
0
=================
sample input 9：
2
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999
10000000000000000000

sample output 9：
9999999999999999999989999999999999999999
=================
sample input 10：
2
10000000000000000000
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999

sample output 10：
-9999999999999999999989999999999999999999
=================
sample input 11：
2
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999

sample output 11：
0
=================
sample input 12：
2
9578977894569458768957689498576
3879820923099819028419182498493572571412

sample output 12：
-3879820913520841133849723729535883072836
=================

2
12903129413974305729385092389023492
17984731893298742340

sample output 13：
12903129413974287744653199090281152
=================
sample input 14：
2
9749823749999999999991284901093564590
9749823749999999999991284901093564590

sample output 14：
0
=================

3

9999999999999999999999999999999999999999
9999999999999999999999999999999999999999

sample output 18：
99999999999999999999999999999999999999980000000000000000000000000000000000000001
=================

3879820923099819028419182498493572571412
